headline: Is Kinder Morgan Fairly Priced After Recent Run and Conflicting Valuation Signals?
summary: If you have been wondering whether Kinder Morgan is still a buy at around $26.73, you are not alone. This article is going to unpack what that price really implies for long term investors. Despite a modest pullback over the last week and month with returns of -3.7% and -2.5% respectively, the stock is still up 3.8% over the past year and 78.2% and 151.6% over 3 and 5 years, which suggests the market has steadily been re rating the business. Recently, attention has focused on Kinder Morgan’s...
